name: Maps
description: Replace vanilla maps by the PSX ones.
<ul>
• These maps do not support new difficulties (Hard and Pharaoh), so they should not be played on any difficulty level besides Normal.
• Checkpoints are unavailable on these maps (just like in the original PSX version).
• Kilmaat Colony is not replaced as the PSX map wasn't shipped with PSE.

name: Ammo Counts
description: Change the ammo count for some weapons.
<ul>
• Amun Bombs: 15 -> 20
• Flamethrower: 65 -> 60
• Cobra Staff: 16 -> 20
• Sacred Manacle: 6 -> 15
WARNING: Affects balance heavily.

name: M-60 Fire Timings
description: Remove the delay after every third shot when firing the M-60.
NOTE: Makes this weapon stronger by approx. 8%.

name: Explosion Sound
description: Restore a beefier explosion sound.

name: Amun Bomb Throwing
description: Decrease the maximum Amun Bomb throw distance and charging rate.

name: Incendiary Bombs
description: Add an ignition effect to the Amun Bombs.

name: Flamethrower Flame
description: Disable fading of the flamethrower flame.

name: Cobra Staff Animation
description: Replace Cobra Staff animation by the PSX one.

name: Cobra Staff Projectile Behavior
description: Slow down the Cobra Staff projectile and decrease its turn rate.

name: Sacred Manacle Behavior
description: Slow down the Sacred Manacle lightning bolt and add its guiding.

name: Sacred Manacle Sound
description: Change the Sacred Manacle charging sound.

name: Telepathic Ramses
description: Disable any mouth movement while Ramses speaks.

name: Transparent Ramses
description: Make Ramses look more like a spirit.

name: Steady Warp Pyramid
description: Disable warp pyramid bobbing.

name: Steady Items
description: Disable item bobbing.

name: Steady Keys
description: Disable key bobbing.

name: Steady Ankhs
description: Disable ankh bobbing.

name: Steady Artifacts
description: Disable artifact bobbing.

name: Steady Team Dolls
description: Disable team doll bobbing.

name: Remove Spiders
description: Replace red spiders by the blue scorpions.

name: Extreme Anubis Death
description: Replace Anubis death animation by the gibbing animation.

name: Mummy Projectile Behavior
description: Slow down the Mummy projectile and increase its turn rate.

name: Extreme Mummy Death
description: Replace Mummy death animation by the gibbing animation.

name: Mantis Attack
description: Change Mantis' attack so that it shoots three fireballs simultaneously instead of sequentially.

name: Mantis Decapitation
description: Replace Mantis' death by a decapitation.

name: Delayed Orb Spawning
description: Delay the orb spawning from the destroyed vases.

name: No Weapon Boost
description: Disable the weapon boost orb spawning.

name: Vanilla HUD Heads
description: Replace HUD heads by the original ones.

name: Remove HUD Scarabs
description: Remove scarabs from HUD.
